Text: I need help in installing! it says i must extract it in D:/SWAT 4, and i cant extract it because it is my CD driver and it is not accessible!! please help !!! Thanx!!!
I don't like the title of this torrent. It suggests that the game data origins from gog.com. That's not the case, since gog.com doesn't have this game in their catalouge.

dont  work  at  my  pc  after  unrar,instalation  dont  work,  its    say please  insert  disk  to  drive  D    and  when  i mount  it  with  daemon  stil  didnt  work...   enyway  thx  uploader    :D

This torrent is NOT from gog.com and it DOES NOT run on Win 7 x64. It's a pre-installed copy of SWAT 4 (v1.0 though the latest is 1.1) with a cracked exe and reg file that needs editing to point to where you place the files. At least the torrent was virus-free but was a complete waste of time downloading.

I've got a Windows XP 32bit, and this torrent worked wonderfully for me. The only problem I had was the default installation directory, and that's easy to change. Single player works, and I was excited to see that multiplayer did as well. Great torrent overall I thought.
